name: Create Storage Volumes for LXC
description: Creates Proxmox storage volumes (mpX) and attaches them to the container. Volumes are named by hostname and can be shared across CTs.

parameters.name: ID of the LXC Container
parameters.description: Optional. If set, volumes are attached to the container.

parameters.name: Hostname
parameters.description: Optional. Used for per-host volume subdirectories.

parameters.name: Volume Storage
parameters.description: Proxmox storage ID for data volumes

parameters.name: Include in Backup
parameters.description: Whether the volume should be included in Proxmox backups

parameters.name: Shared Volume
parameters.description: Allow the volume to be shared across containers (reuse by hostname)
